Name: Saint George
Description: The capital region, known for its vibrant port, historical sites, and as the economic and cultural center of Grenada.

Name: Saint Andrew
Description: Known for its agricultural products, particularly nutmeg and cocoa, and beautiful beaches.

Name: Saint David
Description: A region characterized by rural landscapes, beaches, and historical sites such as forts and churches.

Name: Saint John
Description: A coastal region known for its beaches and fishing industry, as well as its proximity to the capital.

Name: Saint Mark
Description: A region with a mix of agriculture and tourism, featuring natural beauty, including waterfalls and beaches.

Name: Saint Patrick
Description: Famous for its nutmeg plantations and charming villages, this region is also known for its rural beauty.
